- Task sorting (priority, due date, creation date)

- Customizable quick prompts for AI agent
- Light/dark theme support with auto-detection
- System tray integration
- Global hotkey for quick task addition (Ctrl+Alt+T)
- Auto-launch on Windows startup

- Add date indicators: Display calendar icon on tasks with due dates, showing both due date and created date on hover
